alert.note: Alert for Henderson; Van Zandt (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued June 23 at 6:25PM CDT until June 23 at 7:15PM CDT by NWS Dallas-Fort Worth
info.description: The National Weather Service in Fort Worth has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Van Zandt County in north central Texas... Northeastern Henderson County in central Texas... * Until 715 PM CDT. * At 625 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Canton, moving southeast at 30 mph. HAZARD...65 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Athens, Gun Barrel City, Canton, Mabank, Chandler, Van, Brownsboro, Eustace, Edom, Forest Grove Reservoir, Purtis Creek State Park, Lake Palestine, Redland, Myrtle Springs, Murchison, Ben Wheeler, Whitton, Roddy, Jackson and Oakland. This includes Interstate 20 between mile markers 519 and 542. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...65 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection get inside a sturdy structure and stay away from windows.
